job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: strongStax by FattmerchantbrbrstrongstrongWere more than a Technology Payments Company Were a People CompanybrbrstrongFrom simplified flatrate payment technology to a full line of innovative business tools there are so many ways to make a difference with Stax With a team of talented and inspiring people who are as diverse as the solutions we offer Stax is a home for innovators collaborators and mission drivers to come together and make a meaningful impact on the businesses we servebrbrSince 2014 Stax has been shaping the future for thousands of businesses with solutions and technology that supports their journey to growth It is our belief that every business deserves the ability to focus on what matters most to thembrbrstrongWhy Youll Love Stax by Fattmerchant brbrstrongAs a familial and highly spirited place to work the Stax team makes every moment memorable  for our team our customers our partners and our community From an imaginative drive to endless curiosity and the courage to do things differently at Stax we make things happen together and are driven by our core valuesbrbrstrongCreate JoybrbrstrongWe are united by the desire to give and a deep understanding of what truly matters in life Reliability and trust support our capacity to do what we love with a ready smilebrbrstrongGet It DonebrbrstrongWe hone in on what matters to businesses We cheer and challenge pushing each other to take one more step Then another We dont stop We just roll up our sleeves and grindbrbrstrongOne TeambrbrstrongWe communicate with vulnerability and an open heart We inspire each other as we work towards a common purpose and goal We spark joy and happiness across our team members and our customersbrbrWere proud to be recognized for our excellence in technology work environment and entrepreneurial spirit with such honors as Best Fintech to Work For from PaymentSource Coolest Office Space from Orlando Business Journal and one of Entrepreneur Magazines Top Company Cultures Not to mention countless acknowledgements in technology innovation and leadership from publications across the industrybrbrliAs part of our interview process we will be using a video interviewing platform Spark Hire The video interviewing platform will allow our hiring team and candidates to connect more quickly without the pressure of synchronizing calendars for our initial phase of candidate assessments Our goal with the video interviewing portion of our hiring process is to learn more about your personality and previous work experiencebrbrlistrongYour Opportunity brbrstrongAs the Software EngineerFull Stack Engineer you will be responsible for leading a variety of team members involved in several products at once for various platforms and services This is a technical leadership role responsible for assisting at any technical capacity within the team to unblock and enable engineers and QA personnel This person works to set standards and procedures with the team This experienced engineer should be a great culture fit who is passionate about the team members success and the technology behind each product Openness and vulnerability is a musthavebrbrstronguWhat Youll Dobrustrongul liThis person is the resident technical expert on the teamli liExecute the plans set forth by the CTO amp Director of Technology on a technical levelli liSets standards and procedures for the team to followli liResearches new technology and best solutions for each problemli liCollaborate closely with other teams including Marketing FInance BizDev and Operationsli liSupport and troubleshooting issues with existing codeli liAssist heavily in product releases revisions patches and code reviewsli liMake decisions backed up by usage data and reporting toolsli liKeep products up to date with new technologyli liUnderstands and improves all code bases currently under developmentli liUnderstand the role of DevOps for releases and monitoringli liOther duties as assignedli brbrulstronguRequirementsbrbrustrongstrongYour Qualificationsbrstrongul liSuperb verbal and electronic communication skillsli liLeads by exampleli liFrontend and Backend Web Development Technologiesli liExperience with leading a technology teamli liUnderstanding of web services technologies such as HTTP WSDL XSD and RESTli liSecurity principles and architectureli liExperience with DevOps  prefer AWSli liFamiliarity with scripting languages eg Typescript NodeJS Bash PHP is a requirementli liExperience with PHP React Typescript NodeJS MySQLli brbrulustrongBenefitsbrstronguul liHealth Insurance medical dental visionli liComprehensive voluntary benefits li liCompetitive Base Salary li li4 401K Matchli li Conference amp Continuing Education Coverageli li Team Building EventsOpportunitiesli li Downtown Parkingli li Unlimited PTOli li Free snacks  Coffeeli brulWe strongly believe in the value of having a diverse team and actively work to maintain an inclusive environment strongWe encourage BIPOC and candidates of any gender and orientation to applybrbrstrongStax is an equal opportunity employer We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity marital status genetic information national origin disability veteran status and other protected characteristics
